metadata.synopsis: After fighting and killing a group of duergar servants that mutinied against him, Nere takes his rage and frustration out on one of their bodies by kicking it. Once he's done, he takes the players to a nearby broken bridge and explains that he needs reinforcements. The player can promise they'll inform his boss - Chosen Ketheric - or not.

22.speaker: Nere
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the duergar corpsesInternalNodeContext: Note: speaking of the duergar

89.speaker: Nere
89.text: You don't deserve the death you got. I should have made it last.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the duergar corpses

34.speaker: Nere
34.text: As for the rest of you slave-worms - you've caused enough trouble.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere rears back to cast a spell at the remaining gnomes

68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere fires the spell and the gnomes are dead.

80.speaker: Player
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere fires the spell and the gnomes are dead.

57.text: This was meant to be a simple operation - I arrive, those pack animals clear the debris, and I walk into the temple.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere fires the spell and the gnomes are dead.

96.text: This was meant to be a simple operation - I arrive, those pack animals clear the debris, and I walk into the temple.

46.speaker: Nere
46.text: This was meant to be a simple operation - I arrive, those pack animals clear the debris, and I walk into the temple.

108.speaker: Nere
108.text: Instead, I've been beset by incompetence, treachery, and now this. The Absolute's business remains unfinished.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: On 'this' he gestures to the broken bridge in front of him.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Unfortunate - but how does this concern me?
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

82.speaker: Player
82.text: And what business is that, exactly?
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

32.speaker: Nere
32.text: Important business. My orders come from General Thorm himself.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

112.speaker: Nere
112.text: I need you to deliver a message to him. Tell the General that I did what I could, but that the route through Grymforge is impassable.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

56.speaker: Player
56.text: First tell me what happened to this place.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

4.speaker: Nere
4.text: When the General entrusted me with this mission, he warned there may be some damage caused by a monster let loose in the temple.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: The General? Is he a favourite of the Absolute?
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

8.speaker: Nere
8.text: The favourite. Nothing is done in these lands without his knowledge.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I'll do it. Where can I find the General?
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

3.speaker: Nere
3.text: The General resides at Moonrise Towers, but you cannot simply travel there. The land surrounding the Towers is blighted by a deadly curse.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

113.speaker: Player
113.text: If you survived, I'm sure I will.
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

37.speaker: Player
37.text: If that's the case, how do I reach it safely?
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

50.speaker: Nere
50.text: I had a Moonlantern to keep the curse at bay. Alas, the rocks did it in.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pulls out a broken moonlantern to show you

1.speaker: Nere
1.text: Broken. We meddled in these paltry affairs, and for what?
1.context: NodeContext: Exasperated. Some special equipment the party went out of their way to retrieve is broken beyond repair.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: Broken. We meddled in these paltry affairs, and for what?
28.context: NodeContext: Exasperated. Some special equipment the party went out of their way to retrieve is broken beyond repair.

62.speaker: Shadowheart
62.text: Damn it. So much for using that thing to protect us.
62.context: NodeContext: Exasperated. Some special equipment the party went out of their way to retrieve is broken beyond repair.

25.speaker: Karlach
25.text: It's broken?! Argh, you've got to be kidding!
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: stows the moon lantern back where he kept it

48.speaker: Nere
48.text: Calm yourself - we have allies on the surface. Seek them out, and play this lyre to call on their guide.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: stows the moon lantern back where he kept it

0.speaker: Nere
0.text: Calm yourself - we have allies on the surface. Seek them out, and play this lyre to call on their guide.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: stows the moon lantern back where he kept it

84.speaker: Nere
84.text: Whatever you do - do not attempt the journey to Moonrise without his protection. I promise you, it will not end well.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Minthara already offered to help me.

65.speaker: Nere
65.text: Minthara? I'm surprised she hasn't got herself killed on one of her reckless raids.

77.speaker: Nere
77.text: You would be wiser to align yourself with me than her. Few earn the General's favour - I am sure to be among them.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: All right, I'll tell the General what happened here.

69.speaker: Nere
69.text: Do not tarry. I will see you again, but only when my work is done.

16.speaker: Nere
16.text: I can still reach the temple and fulfil the General's orders. His advisor, Balthazar, also sought a way.

71.speaker: Nere
71.text: I'll pick up his trail and follow him. Prove myself his superior.

18.speaker: Nere
18.text: I am generous to those who aid him. When I return to Moonrise, I will be triumphant, and you will share in my victory.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I'd rather make my own way than rely on your help.

107.speaker: Nere
107.text: You insolent worm. You would refuse Nere? Refuse the Absolute?

115.speaker: Nere
115.text: If you won't help me, I may as well enjoy this.

100.speaker: Nere
100.text: The Absolute should be demanding I take your head for insolence like that, but I can't hear Her voice.

31.speaker: Nere
31.text: What's going on? What have you done?

78.speaker: Player
78.text: What are you talking about? I can hear Her just fine.

6.speaker: Nere
6.text: I - never mind. Go to the General at Moonrise. There's little time to waste.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Explain that the Absolute is a front for mind flayers - you're protected from them.

11.speaker: Nere
11.text: Impossible. I should slit your throat for speaking such blasphemy.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Forget it. I was merely testing your faith.
106.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

7.speaker: Player
7.text: It's true - it's a shadowy conspiracy headed by mind flayers and... tax collectors.
7.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

101.speaker: Nere
101.text: I - I don't understand. I've been following those wretched beasts?
101.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

88.speaker: Nere
88.text: I - I don't understand. I've been following those wretched beasts?
88.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Your faith in Lolth faltered. It is not too late to reclaim it.
23.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

60.speaker: Nere
60.text: Was I so weak as to betray the Weaver?

73.speaker: Nere
73.text: I will take word to the Order of Soul Spiders. They must know of the Absolute threat.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Your faith in Lolth faltered. It is not too late to reclaim it.
41.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Yes, I bet you're feeling pretty stupid right now, aren't you?
24.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

35.speaker: Nere
35.text: No. You have a trick - an enchantment. If it can protect you, it'll protect me. All I have to do is take it.
35.context: NodeContext: You're about to attack the player

14.speaker: Player
14.text: You don't have to. Run - abandon the Absolute.
14.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

55.speaker: Nere
55.text: Perhaps you're right. Perhaps I should.
55.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

17.speaker: Nere
17.text: Perhaps you're right. Perhaps I should.

53.text: Abandon the Absolute? After everything I've done for Her? Everything She's done for me?
53.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

98.speaker: Nere
98.text: Abandon the Absolute? After everything I've done for Her? Everything She's done for me?
98.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

9.speaker: Nere
9.text: No, it's not true - you're here to test my faith. And I will not fail.
9.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

103.speaker: Player
103.text: People have followed cults for a long time. You're just another victim.
103.context: NodeContext: Ashamed but mostly angry that he was deceived

87.speaker: Nere
87.text: You're right. I'm a fool for not seeing it before now.
87.context: NodeContext: Ashamed but mostly angry that he was deceived

81.speaker: Nere
81.text: You're right. I'm a fool for not seeing it before now.
81.context: NodeContext: Ashamed but mostly angry that he was deceived

12.speaker: Nere
12.text: Dying for a cause is one thing, but for a mind flayer? For filth like that? No.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Generic item hand-off below camera - item TBD

70.speaker: Nere
70.text: I owe you a debt. And I would hate to be ungrateful.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Generic item hand-off below camera - item TBD

44.speaker: Nere
44.text: Take this - a personal blessing. I pray we don't meet again.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Generic item hand-off below camera - item TBD

110.speaker: Nere
110.text: I owe you a debt, it seems. You've saved me from worse than the duergar.

19.text: The Absolute is no mere cult - it is a calling. And you are here to test my faith.
19.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

49.speaker: Nere
49.text: The Absolute is no mere cult - it is a calling. And you are here to test my faith.
49.context: NodeContext: Last sentence grim and determined - about to attack

109.speaker: Nere
109.text: It cannot be. Have I betrayed Lolth for an impostor?

42.speaker: Nere
42.text: It cannot be. Have I betrayed Lolth for an impostor?

52.text: Fool. My mind is not your playground.

76.speaker: Nere
76.text: Fool. My mind is not your playground.

97.text: You expect me to believe such madness?

27.speaker: Nere
27.text: You expect me to believe such madness?

5.speaker: Nere
5.text: I will tear your heart from your chest. And I will hear Her voice again.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: I was abducted by mind flayers. That was when I began to hear the Absolute.

99.text: Liar. I've seen no such creatures.

75.speaker: Nere
75.text: Liar. I've seen no such creatures.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I haven't done anything, but I don't hear Her either.

36.speaker: Nere
36.text: It's you, it must be. You've done something to anger Her.

21.speaker: Nere
21.text: Whatever it is, I'll set it right. I'll cut you down in Her name!

30.speaker: Nere
30.text: There is another way, though - we have allies on the surface. Seek them out, and play this lyre to call on their guide.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: stows the moon lantern back where he kept it

94.speaker: Astarion
94.text: Of course they did. Why would anything go our way?
94.context: NodeContext: Annnoyed at yet another setback.

33.speaker: Wyll
33.text: The Moonlantern's broken? Just our luck.

86.speaker: Gale
86.text: A broken Moonlantern? They say that's ten years of bad luck.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I'm not risking a curse for you, the General, or anyone else.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: You can report your own failures.

72.speaker: Nere
72.text: This is not a failure, it's only a setback. I have been entrusted with a sacred mission - I cannot fail.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Whoever sent you isn't going to be very happy.
59.context: NodeContext: Uncertain that the General will understand

20.speaker: Nere
20.text: No - the General will understand that none of this was my fault. He will understand, because you will tell him.
20.context: NodeContext: Uncertain that the General will understand

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Enter Nere's mind. 'The gnomes must be set free.'
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere reacts to a brief mindmeld while maintaining the spell at the ready, then regains his composure

79.speaker: Nere
79.text: I... yes. It will be so.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere reacts to a brief mindmeld while maintaining the spell at the ready, then regains his composure

29.speaker: Nere
29.text: I... yes. It will be so.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere reacts to a brief mindmeld while maintaining the spell at the ready, then regains his composure

67.speaker: Nere
67.text: Gnomes, you are slaves no longer. The Absolute may have use for you yet.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere lowers his arm and enters default speaking position. Addressed to remaining gnomes

91.text: I don't know what you are, that you can defy the Absolute's will.
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere reacts to a brief mindmeld while maintaining the spell at the ready, then frowns at the player before delivering his line

93.speaker: Nere
93.text: I don't know what you are, that you can defy the Absolute's will.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nere reacts to a brief mindmeld while maintaining the spell at the ready, then frowns at the player before delivering his line

61.speaker: Nere
61.text: But I know you are a traitor - and I will show no mercy!
